item.description: On Thursday, October 25th, at 7:15p, the Disproof Atheism Society will present “A Disproof of a God Who Created Nature,” a talk by Gilbert Fulmer, Professor of Philosophy at Texas State University-San Marcos, based on “The Concept of the Supernatural,” in M. Martin & R. Monnier (eds.), The Impossibility of God (2003), pp. 326-29, www.jstor.org/pss/3327510. Location: Rm. 442, BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to all. For more information, email info@disproofatheism.org.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society: "Disproof of a God Who Created Nature"
